servinfo.title: Hard starting (Engine cranks OK)
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the followings when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection and Engine Basic Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Loose connection or disconnection of high-tension cord(s) or lead wire(s) (for M16 engine)

ptxt.intxref: High-Tension Cord Removal and Installation (For M16 Engine)

ps.ptxt: Dirty or clogged fuel hose or pipe
Air drawn in through intake manifold gasket or throttle body gasket

ptxt.intxref: Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection

ps.ptxt: Faulty accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly

ptxt.intxref: Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection

ps.ptxt: Faulty ECT sensor or MAF sensor

action.ptxt: Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection or Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor Inspection
Compression Check:For M16A Engine with VVT or Compression Check:For J20 Engine

ps.ptxt: Poor spark plug tightening or faulty gasket

action.ptxt: Valves and Valve Guides Inspection:For J20 Engine or Valves and Valve Guides Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT .
Valves and Valve Guides Inspection:For J20 Engine or Valves and Valve Guides Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT .
Valve Spring Inspection:For J20 Engine or Valve Spring Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT

ps.ptxt: Compression leak at cylinder head gasket

action.ptxt: Cylinder Head Inspection:For J20 Engine or Cylinder Head Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT
Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Inspection and Cleaning:For J20 Engine or Cylinders, Pistons and Piston Rings Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT
Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Inspection and Cleaning:For J20 Engine or Cylinders, Pistons and Piston Rings Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT

ps.ptxt: Camshaft position control (VVT) system out of order (for M16 engine)

ptxt.intxref: Oil Control Valve Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT
